msg: [MTOMCAT-122] add all plugin dependencies to the tomcat class loader

author: sergeyb
msg: [CXF-3589] Prototyping the skeleton code for supporting saml web sso on the SP side based on Colm's test

author: rwesten
msg: * adds inspection API for the Stanbol Enhancer configuration (see documentation for details)
* adds /enhancer/sparql endpoint allowing to query the Enhancer configuration
* adds {enhancer-endpoint}/ep allowing to retrieve the ExecutionPlan configured for Enhancement Chains
* adds support for making enhancement requests to single Enhancement Engines
* adds a lot of new integration-tests for this features
STANBOL-3: Added owl files for the schmas used by the Stanbol Enhancer
* changed the namespace for ExecutionMetadata from "executionMetadata#" to "executionmetadata"

author: colen
msg: OPENNLP-450: The dummy POS Tagger was not working correctly if we use the tag method that passes an additional context

author: fmartelli
msg: Connector configuration properties setting used to fail with character property type
